subject: Is this an EVP? (help-me.mp3 in RobE folder)
author: Rob E
full_text:
Hi all, new to the group...I recorded this by accident on plane last 
year while waiting to take off, and trying to figure out an mp3 player 
my son just bought me.  I'm not sure if it's real or not...I remember 
no one was talking around me at the time...could it have been some 
random fabric sound?

If it is real, how likely for someone on the other side to be on an 
air plane, and what kind of help would they need?

Thanks,
Rob
